ingredients.ingredient: 16 each oysters on the half shell
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)

cookingTips: Pat oysters dry before cooking to prevent splattering
Mix Worcestershire and hot sauce beforehand for even application
Watch closely - oysters cook quickly and can become rubbery if overdone
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through cooking oysters in the air fryer, including prep, seasoning application, cooking time, and how to tell when they're done.
